thread.title: C Fletcher
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by C Fletcher

author: C Fletcher
title: C Fletcher
text: I inadvertently ordered the wrong size oval opening in the custom mat I ordered. It was too big and there was nothing I could use it for. I emailed to see if there was anything that could be done and was told don't worry we'll cut another one for no charge. I just had to pay shipping for the new one. This is such an amazing thing I will be passing this companies name along to friends and family. The quality of their products is excellent and receipt of items is very prompt. I would give 10 stars if I could. Such a refreshing experience.
